For it was not an enemy <S%H341><s%> who insulted <S%H2778><s%> me, <S%H5375><s%> then I could have endured it. <S%H8130><s%> Neither was it he who hated me who raised <S%H1431><s%> himself up against me, <S%H5641><s%> then I would have hidden myself from him.
